textArr:
The Waterfalls of Kedah state begins with its eastern boundary demarcated by the Main Range. 
The steep hills END rather quickly and the terrain changes into lowlands. Then, among the wide lowland plain at one spot beside the sea coast, a massive Gunong Jerai suddenly makes its presence felt.
In the sparsely populated highland areas, many river sources are left intact including the 'original' waterfalls
The state is literally littered with waterfalls, only a couple of the larger ones have been developed as well visited picnic spots.
   
   


	   Accessability: Easy

	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Unknown waterfall in pretty surroundingsLast update April 2014

	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  Recreation park with a few small waterfallsLast update August 2005

	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekkingCamping
	  A well maintained recreation park with beautiful cascades and falls
Last update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Durian PeranginPulau Langkawi,  Gunung Raya
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Attractive, well-maintained recreational park with some nice falls. Seasonal.Last update September 2007
	 
	  
	  Junjong waterfall15 km South of Kulim
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  Popular waterfalls, not far from KulimLast update December 2010

	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  Well maintained park and a popular weekend destination.Last update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Lata Hujan Lebat40 km north of Baling
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Remote fall in Northern Kedah. Clear water, pristine surroundingsLast update February 2012
	 
	  
	  Lata Mengkuang12 km from Sik, near the Thai border
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  A nice waterfall in remote surroundings
Last update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Perangin SikNear Sik
	  Cascades
	  PicnicSwimmingCamping
	  A recreation park with a cascade and a small fallLast update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Puteri MandiGunung Jerai
	  Single fall
	  Trekking
	  Seasonal FallLast update August 2005
	 
	  
	  Serdang FallsNear Serdang
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Popular recreation park. Fals also know as Batu Hampar fallsLast update January 2008
	 
	  
	  Telaga TujohPulau Langkawi
	  Single fall
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  The fall is at its best in the rainy season, September/October. The name comes from the seven pools at the top of the fall
Last update September 2007
	 
	  
	  Temurun WaterfallPulau Langkawi, road to Damay Bay Resort
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Tallest fall of Langkawi. SeasonalLast update September 2007
	 
	  
	  Ulu PaipEast of Kulim
	  RapidsCascades
	  PicnicSwimming
	  Recreational Forest with some rapids and a small waterfall.Last update July 2006

	  Sg Jagong FallsNot in Kedah, but in Croatia!
	  Multiple falls
	  PicnicSwimming
	  An email about these falls has been circulating on the Internet for years already. It is a hoax. There are no Sg Jagong waterfalls. Last update July 2007
